mapper.select: select c.* , (select count(carpool_idx) from CARPOOL_LIKE where c.carpool_idx=carpool_idx) cnt, (select count(carpool_idx) from CARPOOL_LIKE where c.carpool_idx=carpool_idx and mem_idx=#{m_idx}) heart_flag from (select * from CARPOOL) c order by c.carpool_idx desc
